Dear Hagop,

 

Trust my email finds you well. Please be advised that the D&O policy of the Chalhoub Group is due for renewal on 30/11/2025. We would require the following to provide renewal terms:

 

*	Attached proposal form (attaching the one used for the expiry)
*	Organisational chart
*	Latest audited financials 

 

With regard to the US exposure, please share the list of entities in the US and their relation to the parent company. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you. 

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen

With regard to the US exposure, please share the list of entities in the US and their relation to the parent company.
